## isMFARequiredError() function

Check if the provided error indicates Multi-Factor-Authentication is required during authentication.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isMFARequiredError(e: unknown): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | <code>unknown</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

## Remarks

The error may be thrown when attempting to login/signup if configured.
